content: Butter Chicken Bowl lovers, listen up! Introducing the ultimate comfort food that will make you want to come back for more. Savory tender chicken in a rich butter sauce, served over fluffy rice and infused with Indian spices. It's so delicious, you'll want to shout "Butter, yes please!" Try it now and we promise you'll be back for more. Take advantage of our limited time offer and get 10% off with code BUTTERBOWL10. Don't wait, order yours now and indulge in the mouth-watering flavor of our Butter Chicken Bowl! #ButterChicken #ComfortFood
